resources.string: "If you enjoy using Heriswap, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!"
"You seem really good. Would you like to start a new game with increased difficulty?"

"Aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1× ×feuille1,1× ×feuille1,1×.
Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1× ×feuille3,1× to create a combination and earn points."
"The ×herisson_2_5,2× shows how much time is left, and the game is over when it reaches screen's right edge. Tap him to get a hint!"

"The goal is to score the most points.
Game is time limited."

"The ×feuille5,1× on its back scores bonus points.
For each successful combination extra time is added. The best way to earn lot of time is to complete a level. This is done by clearing the top branch of all its leaves."

"The goal is to remove all the leaves ×feuille2,1× from the tree as fast as possible.
This is done by aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1× ×feuille1,1× ×feuille1,1×.
Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1× ×feuille3,1× to create a combination."

"The ×herisson_2_5,2× shows the progress. Game is finished when it reaches screen's right edge.
Every combination using bonus type leaves ×feuille5,1× score double."
"The goal is to score the most points in exactly 100 seconds."
"You seem to be good, maybe do you want to start this game at level 10 ?"
